member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.ExportRunOptions.ExportAllSimulationsIfListIsEmpty
member.summary: Specifies if all simulations should be exported if the provided list of Simulations is empty. Default is true and will be overwritten for special use cases

member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.JsonRunOptions.RunForAllOutputs
member.summary: Indicates whether all outputs of the simulation should be exported or only the one actually selected in the simulation. Default value is TRUE

member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.JsonRunOptions.JacobianUse
member.summary: How do we deal with Jacobian. As is to stay compatible with version prior to v11

member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.QualificationRunOptions.ConfigurationFile
member.summary: Json configuration file that will be converted into a configuration object

member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.QualificationRunOptions.Validate
member.summary: Specifies a validation run (e.g. no actual calculation will be performed.). Default is false

member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.QualificationRunOptions.Run
member.summary: Should simulation be performed as part of the run?

member.name: P:PKSim.CLI.Core.RunOptions.QualificationRunOptions.ExportProjectFiles
member.summary: Specifies if project files (snapshot and PK-Sim project file should be exported)

member.name: F:PKSim.CLI.Core.Services.SimulationExportMode.Xml
member.summary: Sim Model file (simulation used by sim model for Matlab and R)

member.name: F:PKSim.CLI.Core.Services.SimulationExportMode.Pkml
member.summary: pkml Model (simulation used by mobi and pksim)

member.name: F:PKSim.CLI.Core.Services.SimulationExportMode.Xlsx
member.summary: Export simulation results to excel (Individual simulations only)

member.name: F:PKSim.CLI.Core.Services.SnapshotExportMode.Project
member.summary: Exports project files from json files

member.name: F:PKSim.CLI.Core.Services.SnapshotExportMode.Snapshot
